item.title: This Artist Captures The True Royalty Of Cats With His 12 Classical Oil Paintings
item.dc:creator: Ahsanul Karim
item.description:
Have you ever seen a cat walking around like it’s the queen of the world? Well, they may not actually be royalty, but they sure act like it! Cats have a certain confidence and arrogance that is pretty amusing to watch. And while some people may think cats are independent and standoffish, I think they’re […]

The post This Artist Captures The True Royalty Of Cats With His 12 Classical Oil Paintings appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
Have you ever seen a cat walking around like it’s the queen of the world? Well, they may not actually be royalty, but they sure act like it! Cats have a certain confidence and arrogance that is pretty amusing to watch. And while some people may think cats are independent and standoffish, I think they’re just misunderstood. Sure, cats can be a little difficult to read sometimes, but that’s what makes them so intriguing.

Japanese surrealist contemporary artist, Tohukiro Kawai is best known for his regal cat paintings. Unique and whimsical the works of this artist look both majestic and playful as they put a smile on your face with their incredible beauty! Drawing inspiration from old masters like da Vinci or Michelangelo he delivers an unforgettable visual style full of myths legends & fantasies that will make you feel like royalty in any setting – even if it’s just at home relaxing before bedtime.

With these 12 beautiful paintings, he portrays their grace, independence, and undeniable feline beauty. Purr-fect for all cat lovers!

1 Fantasy of a Pet Cat

2 The Walking-Style Coronation

The thoughts of a spoiled cat believing that it is the king are visualized in the image of an angel. The impression of the cat inheriting the crown while ambling shows its arrogant but un-hateable nature.

3 Mutualism－Livelihood Of Cat

4 Defensive Instinct

5 Fairies In The Garden

6 Bird and Actindia

7 Hallucination of pet cats to be in contact

8 Thinking thoughts smolder

9 A cat’s favourite things

10 Even angels aren’t safe from a cat’s pounce

11 Cat in a Hat

12 Intellectual cat

We hope you enjoyed this brief journey through the lives of cats depicted as royalty. Each painting is a true masterpiece in its own way, and we’re sure you have your favorite. Let us know in the comments which one you liked the most!

The post This Artist Captures The True Royalty Of Cats With His 12 Classical Oil Paintings appeared first on Favology.

item.title: Artist Photoshops Her Fluffy Cat Into The Most Famous Paintings in Art History, And The Results Won The Internet
item.dc:creator: Ahsanul Karim
item.description:
Some people are talented in one specific area, while others are talented in many. Then there are those rare individuals who can take any talent and run with it. Such is the case with this artist,  Svetlana Petrova, and her fluffy ginger cat. The cat has been photoshopped into some of the most famous paintings […]

The post Artist Photoshops Her Fluffy Cat Into The Most Famous Paintings in Art History, And The Results Won The Internet appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
Some people are talented in one specific area, while others are talented in many. Then there are those rare individuals who can take any talent and run with it. Such is the case with this artist,  Svetlana Petrova, and her fluffy ginger cat. The cat has been photoshopped into some of the most famous paintings in history, and the results are nothing short of amazing.

The project went viral on imgur a few years ago surmounting to over 4.1 million views. Check out these photos for yourself and see just how talented this artist really is!

1 Lady with an Ermine by Leonardo da Vinci (1489–1490)

2 The Persistence of Memory by Salvador Dalí (1931)

3 Liberty Leading the People by Eugène Delacroix (1830)

4 The Creation of Adam by Michelangelo (1511-1512)

5 The Birth of Venus by Sandro Botticelli (1486)

6 Whistler’s Mother by James McNeill Whistler (1871)

7 Twelfth Night (The King Drinks) by David Teniers (1634-1640)

8 The Kitchen Maid by Johannes Vermeer (1657–1658)

9 The Venus of Urbino by Titian (1538)

10 American Gothic by Grant Wood (1930)

11 Escaping Criticism by Pere Borrell del Caso (1874)

12 Bogatyrs (Heroes) by Victor Vasnetsov (1898)

13 Olympia by Édouard Manet (1863)

14 ‘The Kiss’ by Gustav Klimt

15 Mona Lisa by Leonardo da Vinci (1503-1506)

I’ve been scrolling through this list for a solid 30 minutes and can’t decide which one is my favorite! Let me know what you think. Comment below with your vote on the painting you liked the most!

The post Artist Photoshops Her Fluffy Cat Into The Most Famous Paintings in Art History, And The Results Won The Internet appeared first on Favology.

item.title: 10 Cats With Their Celebrity Doppelgangers Will Crack You Up
item.dc:creator: Ahsanul Karim
item.description:
Do you ever look at a celebrity and think, “Hey, they kind of look like my cat”? Well, you’re not alone! Here are ten celebrities and their cat doppelgangers. Some of these pairs are pretty spot-on, while others are a little bit more of a stretch. But either way, it’s fun to see how similar […]

The post 10 Cats With Their Celebrity Doppelgangers Will Crack You Up appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
Do you ever look at a celebrity and think, “Hey, they kind of look like my cat”? Well, you’re not alone! Here are ten celebrities and their cat doppelgangers. Some of these pairs are pretty spot-on, while others are a little bit more of a stretch. But either way, it’s fun to see how similar these celebs and cats look! Keep reading for some hilarious side-by-side comparisons.

1 Adam Driver

The cat looks more like Dobby, the house-elf tho.

2 Salvador Dali

The mustache makes the cat look just like Salvador Dali.

3 James Bond

The name’s Bond…James Bond.

4 Albert Einstein

Which one’s the real Einstein?

5 Xena: Warrior Princess

The cat dressed just like Xena the warrior princess. She’s ready to battle.

6 Adrien Brody

The nose does the job.

7 Charlie Chaplin

8 Adolf Hitler

Cool resemblance to Hilter, who is definitely not a celebrity.

9 Vladimir Lenin

Vladimir Lenin, the first and founding head of the government of Societ Russia.

10 Eugene Levy

Who did it better? I’ll go with the bottom Eugene ‘the kitty’ Levy

Whether you’re a cat lover or not, I think we can all appreciate the hilarity of these furry felines and their celebrity doppelgangers. We’d love to hear your thoughts in the comments below. And be sure to share with your friends.

The post 10 Cats With Their Celebrity Doppelgangers Will Crack You Up appeared first on Favology.

item.title: ‘Spiciest’ Kitten in His Trio, Turns Out To Be A Teddy Bear
item.dc:creator: Ahsanul Karim
item.description:
Three kittens were brought to the Orange County Animal Shelter last month in need of rescue. They were very timid around people. The group was cowering fearfully and would scamper away if approached too closely by any human assumedly. Because it’s not often that you see animals as afraid or shy as these little guys […]

The post ‘Spiciest’ Kitten in His Trio, Turns Out To Be A Teddy Bear appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
Three kittens were brought to the Orange County Animal Shelter last month in need of rescue. They were very timid around people. The group was cowering fearfully and would scamper away if approached too closely by any human assumedly. Because it’s not often that you see animals as afraid or shy as these little guys seemed to be!

Wasabi the kitten.

When the group Baby Kitten Rescue (BKR) heard about the predicament, they offered to help. “The kittens were extremely terrified, unsocial, hissy, and spitty. It was clear they either had no previous human interaction or if they did, it was not positive,” Jamie, a foster volunteer of the BKR, told Love Meow.

“I knew that underneath their rough exterior were just scared little babies wanting to feel safe, cared for, and loved.”

Three timid kittens (Ginger, Pepper, Wasabi) were rescued from the shelter.

The kittens were so cute. They were named after spices—Wasabi (seal point), Ginger (torbie), and Pepper (tuxedo). Even though they were estimated to be only six weeks old, they already knew how to stay close by keeping each other warm!

Despite his tiny stature, Wasabi was the sassiest and he was the only brother. “Wasabi was the spiciest. It was like he took it upon himself to be the protector of the group. He was also the king of the side-eye,” Jamie shared.

Wasabi was the spiciest kitten in his litter.

Wasabi along with his siblings received a daily cuddle session and plenty of treats as rewards for socialization.

“I wrapped Wasabi up in a purrito, cleaned his eyes, administered some eye meds, and rewarded him with some chicken baby food.”

With just a few days of conditioning, Wasabi had successfully learned how to behave when it came to the time for his daily meal. “While he was still the spiciest of the three kittens, he would fall asleep almost immediately if I swaddled him in a baby blanket.”

The kittens were initially very cautious of their people. But over time, they grew more comfortable. By the end, it seemed like these little creatures had finally found a home with those who loved them unconditionally.

“After two weeks of socializing, they started purring when I would pet them. It took a lot of time and patience leading up to this moment. I think holding them and feeding them treats is what signaled to them they were safe,” Jamie told.

With countless hours and a tremendous amount of patience, the kittens went from hissing for their lives to tolerating hugs. All it took was some courage on behalf of these curious cats that had never before experienced affection or attention from humans to seek out petting sessions with people who would stroke them softly while whispering sweet words into each furry ear as if they were an angel come down from heaven itself!

Have a look at Wasabi and his siblings in this cute video:

“They have made such a big transformation from where they were.”

Wasabi used to be the most feisty of these three, but now he’s just as mild and easygoing. “There was a point in time when I wasn’t sure if Wasabi would ever stop hissing at me and not be scared of me,” Jamie wrote.

What a happy cat he is! Now, the foster mom can enjoy his purring on her lap while they hang out together.

Wasabi turned into a teddy bear when he realized he was loved.

“I’m proud of this little dude. He overcame some big fears. He’s not only social but a total lover. He purrs and seems to really love human affection.”

“The best way to socialize kittens is with food and play. They must have consistent, positive interactions with humans over a long period of time to build trust and safety.”

These three little furballs have come a long way and are now ready for their next chapter in life. Wasabi was ready to be adopted for his forever home with Ginger by his side while Pepper found hers too–a loving family of her own!

Ginger and Wasabi, the two best friends.

Jamie shared, “They went from hissing, spitting, swatting, and hiding to purring, playing, and even climbing on me.”

“I find that the spiciest ones are just the most scared, and they usually make the biggest turnaround. I’m seeing that with Wasabi.”

Look at them now.

It looks like this little kitten, who was thought to be the spiciest of his litter, is really just a big softy teddy bear at heart. Share with your buddy and comment below to let us know what you think about this adorable kitty.

 Follow updates on the trio and Jamie’s foster kittens on Instagram @thekittensfoster. Follow Baby Kitten Rescue on Facebook and Instagram.

The post ‘Spiciest’ Kitten in His Trio, Turns Out To Be A Teddy Bear appeared first on Favology.

item.title: Kitten Seeks Everyone’s Attention Until She Finds Another Kitten to Spend Rest of Her Life With
item.dc:creator: Ahsanul Karim
item.description:
A lonely kitten found a friend to spend the rest of her life with. When Penny Richards, a foster carer based in Virginia, was contacted about two 4-week old kittens found on the side of the road, she couldn’t resist. One of them had a congenital defect and was in severe condition, while the other […]

The post Kitten Seeks Everyone’s Attention Until She Finds Another Kitten to Spend Rest of Her Life With appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
A lonely kitten found a friend to spend the rest of her life with.

When Penny Richards, a foster carer based in Virginia, was contacted about two 4-week old kittens found on the side of the road, she couldn’t resist. One of them had a congenital defect and was in severe condition, while the other spent the entire time clinging to her brother. Despite their best attempts, the brother could not survive, and the remaining kitten became alone that night.

“She was attached to her brother’s side from the moment they were found as if she knew he was suffering and needed comfort,” Penny said. “I named her Koa after she lost her brother, as it means warrior, or brave one, in Hawaiian.”

Koa decided to stick to her foster home for a few weeks, needing constant attention.

“She was very energetic and friendly, and a medical exam showed she was healthy. She became very attached to us and people in general,” Penny shared.

“Once we put her into the foster room with the bigger kids, she showed her feisty side and very quickly became the boss of the room – despite her small size.”

Koa walked up to Maggie the tuxedo and established her authority.

When Koa met Huey the orange kitten, he was twice her size. But that didn’t bother this little girl at all! In fact, she found a whole new interest in wrestling and playing with him from then on.

Koa had a fun time scampering around the room, wreaking havoc. Yet she always remained close by her foster mom’s lap.

“Even when she was playing, she was all over my legs, pulling herself up and down my leg with those little daggers. She would run off to chase someone, then come running back and climb on my lap.”

Penny was on the search for a friend her size, realizing how much Koa desired a steady company.

“Around three weeks after we took in Koa, my husband was working at a construction site when he and his coworkers heard meowing,” Penny said.

After some searching, they discovered a tiny kitten hiding beneath a dumpster. They tried coaxing him out, but he refused and eventually retreated into another drain making things more difficult

“My husband and his coworkers took apart the drain, climbed inside, and were able to grab the kitten. They put him safely in a box, and my husband drove him to me at work so that I could care for him and take him home.”

The six-week-old kitten was named Casper. He was very wary of people. But underneath that scared shell was a little soul craving for affection.

“He was a very shy little boy, who would run and hide when we went in the room. Eventually, he would learn to love humans and become a super cuddly boy.”

Casper was placed in the foster room when his upper respiratory troubles were resolved, He met Koa for the first time there.

“He and Koa were about a week apart in age. The two of them formed an immediate friendship. That friendship grew over the following weeks and they became inseparable,” Penny shared. “It warmed my heart to see her find comfort in a new foster brother, after losing her biological brother.”

As they grew up Penny knew that these two were meant to stay as a pair forever.

“They were adopted together at four months old, and now live happily ever after together!”

“Koa lost one brother, but she gained another in Casper.”

What a beautiful story! This kitten went around asking for attention until she found another kitten to spend the rest of her life with. It just goes to show that you never know where or when love will find you. Share this story with your friends.

The post Kitten Seeks Everyone’s Attention Until She Finds Another Kitten to Spend Rest of Her Life With appeared first on Favology.

item.title: 21 Hilarious Doppelganger Dogs Of Famous Celebrities
item.dc:creator: Ahsanul Karim
item.description:
Do you ever see a dog and think, “Wait, that looks just like _!” Well, you’re not the only one. Some dogs bear an uncanny resemblance to celebrities. From their facial features to hairstyles, these dogs are almost identical to some famous celebrities. Scroll down and check out these 22 funniest doppelganger dogs below. You […]

The post 21 Hilarious Doppelganger Dogs Of Famous Celebrities appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
Do you ever see a dog and think, “Wait, that looks just like _!” Well, you’re not the only one. Some dogs bear an uncanny resemblance to celebrities. From their facial features to hairstyles, these dogs are almost identical to some famous celebrities.

Scroll down and check out these 22 funniest doppelganger dogs below. You won’t believe your eyes!

1 This Dog Looks Like Ron Perlman, and Ron Perlman Looks Like Will Ferrel But The Dog Doesn’t Look Like Will Ferrel. Doppelganger Inception

2 Ed the Hyaena from The Lion King!

3 John Travolta! Would He Like To Adopt His Doppelganger Dog?

4 Does It Match Peyton Manning?

5 Isn’t The Dog Matured Like William Macy?

6 OMG!!

7 A Xerox Copy of Harrison Ford

8 Julia Roberts And Her Doppelganger!

9 Dog looking just like Nicole Polizzi

10 Doggo And Ron Perlman Again!

11 No Offense To Whoopi Goldberg

12 Look At The Eyebrows Of The Dog And Those Of Justin Bieber

13 Doggo Looks Like Donald Trump On A Random Windy Day

14 I Don’t Know If The Doggo Is Laughing Or Barking But It Looks Exactly Like Sofia Vergara

15 “What’s Up, Mother F****r?”

16 Chow Chow Copied The Hairstyle Of Tina Turner Or She Did?

17 This Little Buddy Looks More Eric Stonestreet Than The Real Eric Stonestreet

18 Yo, Snoop Dogg!

19 Lady Gaga After A Successful Concert

20 Is That A Real-life Dog? Whatever It Is, It Looks Exactly Like Richard Branson

21 Vladimir Putin!

It’s hard to look at these pictures and not laugh. The doppelganger dogs are just too cute and the uncanny resemblance to their celebrity counterparts is hilarious.

We’d love to know what you think of them, so please leave a comment below. And don’t forget to share this post with your friends – they’re sure to get a good laugh out of it, too!

The post 21 Hilarious Doppelganger Dogs Of Famous Celebrities appeared first on Favology.

item.title: Untamed Majesty Of Nature Is Captured In These Award-Winning Wildlife Images
item.dc:creator: Ahsanul Karim
item.description:
Wildlife photography is an interesting and challenging genre. Looking at the world through a lens, Capturing the natural beauty of animals in their native habitat can be both exhilarating and frustrating. The CEWE Photo Award celebrates this beauty, with photographers from all over the globe submitting their work for consideration. These photos by CEWE award […]

The post Untamed Majesty Of Nature Is Captured In These Award-Winning Wildlife Images appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
Wildlife photography is an interesting and challenging genre. Looking at the world through a lens, Capturing the natural beauty of animals in their native habitat can be both exhilarating and frustrating. The CEWE Photo Award celebrates this beauty, with photographers from all over the globe submitting their work for consideration.

These photos by CEWE award winners are a testament to the skill and patience required to excel in this field. They remind us that there is still much to be explored in the natural world and that we should never take its wonders for granted.

So without further ado, let’s take a look at these amazing photos!

1 Mother’s Love by Dikye Ariani

It’s feeding time! Mother bird lines up her chicks for breakfast in Jakarta, Indonesia.

2 Winter nap by Grzegorz Bukalski

Frosty afternoon! A fox cub finds a sheltered corner for an afternoon nap in Gorczanski National Park in Poland.

3 Intelligenz unter der Wasseroberfläche by Susan Moritz

Under the sea! An octopus in Bremerhaven, Germany, draws comparisons to a mythical creature.

4 Lesnou cestičkou by Lucia Blašková

On an adventure! A curious hedgehog looks ahead. Captured in Slovakia.

5 Sonnendach by Arlette Magiera

Taking shelter! A baby owl finds comfort and refuge under a large leaf in Usingen, Germany.

6 Von Mama gekuesst by Thorsten Hanewald

Motherly affection! A baby giraffe gets some love from its mum. Captured in Kenya’s Masai Mara.

7 Ohhhh Nein by Doris Dörfler-Asmus

Oh no! A squirrel panics after dropping its morning snack. Photographed in Bavaria, Germany.

8 kiekeboe by Tilly Meijer

Peek a boo! A bear looks through a perfectly shaped hole in Spijkenisse, Netherlands.

9 Affenliebe by Michael Milfeit

The look of love! A baby orangutan in Germany looks adoringly at its parent.

10 Seifenblasen Piranha by Jennifer Freytag

Bubbles of fun! A bulldog puppy enjoys playing with bubbles on its walk. The photo was taken in Neunkirchen, Austria.

11 Hier kommt die Maus by Julian Rad

Jumping for joy! A mouse rushed along with dinner in its mouth, photographed in Vienna, Austria.

Wildlife photography is a beautiful way to capture the untamed majesty of nature. The winners of the CEWE Award have done a fantastic job at showcasing the beauty and power of creatures great and small. We hope you’ve enjoyed looking at these stunning photos as much as we have, and if you did, please share them with your friends. As always, thanks for reading!

The post Untamed Majesty Of Nature Is Captured In These Award-Winning Wildlife Images appeared first on Favology.

item.title: You’ll Surely Fall In Love Seeing The Beautiful Pastel Hues Of These Rose-Faced Love Birds
item.dc:creator: Ahsanul Karim
item.description:
Lovebirds are the most beautiful birds in existence. They come with an array of colors that you’ll fall head over heels for, and they can keep us entertained for hours just watching them. They are the perfect couple. They never break up, and they stay together for life. Their mating process starts with courtship which […]

The post You’ll Surely Fall In Love Seeing The Beautiful Pastel Hues Of These Rose-Faced Love Birds appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
Lovebirds are the most beautiful birds in existence. They come with an array of colors that you’ll fall head over heels for, and they can keep us entertained for hours just watching them.

They are the perfect couple. They never break up, and they stay together for life. Their mating process starts with courtship which can last throughout their entire 15-year lifespan-it’s truly amazing when you think about how complicated humans’ relationships have become in just one generation span due to all the technological advances that allow us instant communication globally at any time of day or night, but this also means there is no need anymore Agitate people emotionally before breaking into thoughts so I guess things must be pretty good if someone wants more than what society defines as “perfect.”

When they get separated or if their partner dies, they show behaviors that can be compared to depression. That’s how loyal they are to their partners.

Lovebirds are not only known for their love songs, but they also show it off in public displays of affection. They will often feed on each other after being apart or during stressful periods- which is why these beautiful creatures have earned the name “lovebird.”

You may be wondering what the deal with all these lovebird species is. Well, it turns out that there are quite a few of them around. The most well-known type include green birds found in Africa and Asia respectively – they have similar color schemes to hanging parrots which can sometimes also hang from trees as though their namesakes (but not always).

Where do you think all those beautiful colors come from? They’re in every spectrum of the rainbow, mixed together. You might be more likely to see them at garden centers or on roadsides. There, they blend into their surroundings a little less than other varieties do—but don’t worry! There’s still plenty for everyone who loves this breed type with rosy-faced ones being an example that will amaze anyone lucky enough to meet it properly grown up right before your eyes.

Meet the Rosy-Faced Lovebirds with most striking hues, who have captivated bird lovers around the world. They are not only beautiful but also kind and gentle creatures that will make your heart soar.

The rosy-faced lovebird is easily the most popular species of bird found not only in America but all over the world. They breed like bunnies and there have been many color mutations, including cremates (or “cremes”), lutinos (light brown), pieds(a light iridescent green) fallows(with white markings on their faces).

The lovebirds are a symbol of true romance. They stay together for life and can become sad if you separate them from their partner.

Monogamous in nature, they reach sexual maturity at ten months old. The male will court females until their courtship begins with an introduction through dance or song that lasts several days. They continue their journey throughout their lifespan which can be of 12-15 years.

The rosy-faced lovebird is a beautiful and colorful bird. They have green bodies with blue rump, horn-colored bill as well as grey feet.

With the increasing population, they branched out into more colors. These include white/teal shades as well black with lavender or yellow hues on their surface.

Their appearance, personalities, and intelligence can be compared to those of Parrots.

However, they are significantly small and less noisy. They are native to the forests of Africa but are now easily found all over the world. They may be found in the wild or someone else’s backyard.

They are androgynous and it’s hard to distinguish between the male and female. Nevertheless, both of them are excellent breeders and parents at the same time.
The lovebird species is a small, colorful bird that can grow up to 14 cm. They have rosy faces and large bodies for their size with the potential of reaching 15 centimeters in length.
These beautiful creatures live in the wilds, where they prefer cooler temperatures and higher elevations. They need access to water for survival so their habitats vary depending on whether or not there is rainfall nearby.
These birds are usually found in flocks. when there is an abundant presence of food, they may gather. They can also be pests on agricultural lands since these feathered creatures love to feed off crops such as millet.

The female is in charge of building the nest and incubating it for about twenty-three days. After that, she’ll take care of these baby birds until they’re six weeks old – but not too long after their birth because then male parent will come along ruling over them.

Let’s see those lovely birds in action!

Lovebirds are truly the life of any party when it comes to showing affection and love. They aren’t content with just one person, but will attach themselves as if they were married. Love isn’t something that everyone has in their lives-although some people may think otherwise; these birds know what true happiness feels like because all they care about is making sure that you’re happy too.

We would love to know what you think of them in the comments below! And don’t forget to share this post with your friends and family – they’re sure to fall in love too.

The post You’ll Surely Fall In Love Seeing The Beautiful Pastel Hues Of These Rose-Faced Love Birds appeared first on Favology.
